name: Quandoo Restaurant Reservations
author: Quandoo

sections.description:
This plugin is a user-friendly way of integrating Quandoo’s restaurant reservation system with any WordPress website.

If your restaurant is already a Quandoo partner, you’ll need your unique reservation key to use this plugin. If your restaurant is not yet a Quandoo partner, join here to obtain a new reservation key and then use the plugin.
sections.installation:
Installation is easy, just like any other WordPress plugin:

  1. Download the plugin from WordPress.
  2. Use WordPress /wp-admin/plugin-install.php page to install the plugin or upload the plugin quandoo-restaurant-reservation directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate Restaurant reservation from the ‘Plugins’ (/wp-admin/plugins.php) page in WordPress.
  4. Open Reservations -> Quick Start.
  5. Paste your unique reservation key. If your restaurant is not listed on Quandoo yet, please follow this link.
  6. Click ‘Quick activate’ -> ‘Save Changes’ -> Then receive new reservations through your own website.
sections.faq:
How do I get a reservation key?

To get a unique reservation key, your restaurant must be a Quandoo Partner. If your restaurant is not yet a Quandoo partner, join here.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • First version of the plugin

1.0.1

  • Plugin has been internationalized

1.1.0

  • Descriptive text updated
  • Introduced Multi Restaurant reservation widget

1.1.1

  • Display colour picker for button and multi-button fields

short_description: The official Quandoo restaurant reservation plugin. Quickly integrate a button or calendar widget to start receiving reservations straight away.
